entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 6:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
